original_text:
For they shall be ashamed of the oaks
    that you desired;
and you shall blush for the gardens
    that you have chosen.
korean_text: 너희가 기뻐하던 상수리나무로 말미암아 너희가 부끄러움을 당할 것이요 너희가 택한 동산으로 말미암아 수치를 당할 것이며

sentences.original_text: of the oaks that you desired
for the gardens that you have chosen
